document_data.name: Osman Reza
document_data.mainbody: Imam '''Osman Reza''' was an accomplished [[janni]] ''[[Midani dictionary|alim]]'' in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Osman was an esteemed teacher at the magical [[University of Qadib]]<ref group="note">The source text states the "University of Qadim", but this is believed to be a typo instead of saying the "University of Qadib" because Qadib was renowned for its universities.. He was renowned for his honest and balanced interpretation of the [[Law of the Loregiver]].
